SELECT bm.bm_no, bm.bm_title, bm.bm_writer, bs.bs_file, bm.bm_hit , bm.bm_group, bm.bm_pos, bm.bm_step FROM board_master_t bm, board_sub_t bs WHERE bm.bm_no = bs.bm_no(+)
AND bm_no = #{bm_no}
AND bm_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND bm_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND bm_writer LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER by bm.bm_group DESC, bm.bm_step ASC

INSERT INTO board_master_t(bm_no, bm_title, bm_writer , bm_reg, bm_hit, bm_group, bm_pos, bm_step) VALUES(seq_board_no.nextval, #{bm_title}, #{bm_writer} , to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0, #{bm_group}, #{bm_pos}, #{bm_step})
INSERT INTO board_sub_t(bm_no, bs_seq, bs_file, bs_size) VALUES(seq_board_no.nextval, 1, #{bs_file}, #{bs_size})
